name: Omino!
description:
Omino! is a fun puzzle game where strategy meets match-3.

Drag and match colorful rings to create beautiful chain reactions in this endless brain teaser.
Use the powerful gifts to smash and splash even more rings.
Enjoy this fresh new matching game anywhere, anytime at your own pace!

FEATURES
• Fresh and addictive matching game
• Easy to play, fun to master strategic gameplay
• Global leaderboards and achievements
• Calm your mind with Omino!’s relaxing and beautiful music
• Enjoy the minimalistic flat design and fun animations
• Play at your own pace. No time limits. No Rush.
• Go as high as you can and brag about your score proudly!

Enjoy Omino! - casual, strategic, endless fun!

Join us on Facebook: https://facebook.com/ominogame
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ominogame
